# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would greatly enhance your endeavors. This product holds immense value to me, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. I am offering you the chance to own it at a special price tailored for someone as discerning as yourself. Considering its true worth and the benefits it can bring to you, I propose a price of $1300000. I trust this offer will be favorable and look forward to discussing further details with you. Kind regards, Alice. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,300,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,300,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
